jdbcService.sql: update component_child set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), min_occurs = case when :minOccurs is null then min_occurs else :minOccurs end, max_occurs = case when :maxOccurs is null then max_occurs else :maxOccurs end, child_template_id = case when :childTemplateId is null then child_template_id else :childTemplateId end, parent_anchor_id = case when :parentAnchorId is null then parent_anchor_id else :parentAnchorId end, parent_id = case when :parentId is null then parent_id else :parentId end, child_id = case when :childId is null then child_id else :childId end, create_action_id = case when :createActionId is null then create_action_id else :createActionId end, component_load_type_id = case when :componentLoadTypeId is null then component_load_type_id else :componentLoadTypeId end where id = :id
